= Introduction =

Manual for [http://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Mkinitcpio mkinitcpio] on ArchWiki


= Details =

Installing for dependencies:
  * pacman -S mkinitcpio-nfs-utils
  * install iscsitarget-kernel and iscsitarget-usr from AUR or compile by yourself fresh [http://iscsitarget.sourceforge.net/ version]
  * unpack iscsi-target-box.tgz in /lib/initcpio/
